content: double_crochet in last double_crochet turn 21 double_crochet ● use a removable stitch marker to mark the increasing side of the shawl repeat row 4-19four times ● chain-1 at the beginning of the row does not count as a stitch repeat row 4-13one time fasten_off yarn you can follow the video tutorialhere finishing weave in ends wet block laying flat to dry written instructions charted instructionsare available on page 4 using a strand of fingering weight held together with a strand of lace weight make a magic_ring row 1 ws chain 1 does not count as a stitch here and throughout 3 double_crochet in magic_ring turn 3 double_crochet row 2 rs chain 1 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet double_crochet across turn 4 double_crochet row 3 ws chain 1 double_crochet to last double_crochet 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet turn 5 double_crochet simple asymmetric mohair shawl © 2021 amanda mannas 3 charted instructions using a strand of fingering weight held together witha strand of lace weight follow the simple asymmetric mohair shawl chart simple asymmetric mohair shawl chart finishing weave in ends wet block laying flat to dry simple asymmetric mohair shawl © 2021 amanda mannas 4 questions or comments thank you please email me atinfo@mandobug comif thank you for supporting me as a designer you need additional pattern support and a huge thank you to my tech editorfiat share your finished object on social media fiber arts using@mandobug #simpleasymmetricmohairshawl simple asymmetric mohair shawl © 2021 amanda mannas 5
